name: Hydreigon BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Calamity Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: Hydreigon BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
